snippet.title: SCARLET NEXUS × THE ORAL CIGARETTES 「 Dream In Drive 」 Special Movie
snippet.description:
NOW PLAYING: 「 Dream In Drive 」
Discover the original theme song of Scarlet Nexus by The Oral Cigarettes! 

● Lyrics:
I’m lost inside
誰も見えやしない
I'm falling down
逃れられやしない
They take my brain
この手の感触を
Isn't time too late?
満たせない感覚を切り裂いて

唇が巻き起こすその夢へ
終わりのない
赤い線で君と繋いでいく
 I want you to tell me
世界がそっと無くなるその前に
抱きしめ大切なDream In Drive

Who drowns my brain?
火がついた脳細胞
From the birth till the end
やり場ない代償も切り裂いて

未完成な僕はいつも夢へ
終わりのない
赤い線で君と繋いでいく
I want you to tell me
世界をそっと頼りない面影で包む様
呑み込んだDream In Drive

I’m lost inside
I'm falling down
満たせない感覚を切り裂いて

唇が巻き起こすその夢へ
終わりのない
赤い線で君と繋いでいく
I want you to tell me
世界がそっと無くなるその前に
抱きしめ大切なDream In Drive

始めから決まっていたんだろ
夢で終わらせない
赤い線で君を確かにしたい
I want you to tell me
世界がそっと無くなるその前に
守りたい大切なDream In Drive

● Translation:
I'm lost inside
I can't see anybody
I’m falling down
I can't get out of here
They take my brain
Here is the touch of my hands
Isn't time too late?
Ripping up the unsatisfied feelings

Into the dream stirred up by lips
There's no end
The red string that connects me and you
I want you to tell me
Before the world fades away without a trace
Embrace the precious Dream In Drive

Who drowns my brain?
Brain cells lit in flames
From the birth till the end
Ripping up the compensations that have nowhere to go

The incomplete me always into the dream
There's no end
The red string that connects me and you
I want you to tell me
Like wrapping the world gently with an unreliable memory
Dream In Drive swallowing

I'm lost inside
I'm falling down
Ripping up the unsatisfied feelings

Into the dream stirred up by our lips
There's no end
To the red string that connects me and you
I want you to tell me
Before the world fades away without a trace
Embrace the precious Dream In Drive

It's been all set from the beginning
Never let it end as just a dream
With the red string I want to make you real
I want you to tell me
Before the world fades away without a trace
Want to protect the precious Dream in Drive

Official music video “Dream In Drive”: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XJacT1aW-zg 

Follow us on:
Web: http://scarlet-nexus.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/scarletnexusofficial
Twitter: https://twitter.com/scarlet_nexus
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoeu

#ScarletNexus #TGS2020
